page.title: 19MY HOME BY AN ARMY CHILD
page.content: I live at Lulworth Camp in a semi detached house.It has 2 staircases,2 kitchens and 2 living rooms.In one kitchen we have a football table and a washing machine and in the other,we have a cooker and a chip pan.There are 5 people in my family;Mum and Dad,two older brothers and myself.My Dad is a Corporal,he works in the Mess.My Mum works in the NAAFI.My brother Gareth goes to Bovington Middle School and my older brother Darren goes to PurbecK School.My Dad has a car. He and my Mum can both drive it. Lynsey (Age 8) We have included 2 items on 'MY HOME.'One is from a child living in the village of West Lulworth; the other is from the RAC Gunnery School. They are both pupils at the village school.
